evidence_snippets: Explained the approach by breaking the problem into input parsing, core logic, and edge-case handling.

code_evidence: Used a helper function to separate preprocessing from main logic.
dsa_problem_decomposition.uncertainty_notes: Edge-case handling was described verbally but not fully reflected in code.

evidence_snippets: Stated that the solution runs in O(n) time with O(1) extra space.
Acknowledged that alternative approaches would increase space usage.
code_evidence: No additional data structures beyond constant variables observed.
dsa_complexity_awareness.uncertainty_notes: Complexity justification was informal rather than rigorously derived.

evidence_snippets: Identified an off-by-one error as the cause of failing test cases.
Walked through variable values using a concrete example.
code_evidence: Adjusted loop boundary conditions to fix incorrect indexing.
debug_error_identification.uncertainty_notes: Debugging focused on the observed failure; broader test coverage was not discussed.
